column1: Esporte Clube Itaúna is a football club from the city of Itaúna
column4: 1929. It was founded as Itaúna Foot-Ball Club. The biggest triumph of the club was in 1964 when they beat Cruzeiro
column5: with Tostão and Piazza in the lineup
column6: 2:1 in a friendly match inaugurating their current home field Estádio Municipal José Flávio de Carvalho.
